channel.title: crypto on Website of Aditya Arakeri
channel.description: Recent content in crypto on Website of Aditya Arakeri

item.title: krypter
item.description:
A node wrapper around the native crypto module which uses the below capabilities

  • Algorithm: aes-256-cbc
  • default key and iv generation
  • Crypt main class
  • a encrypt method
  • a decrypt method
